com.binghamton.jhelp

Class ColorStringBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.binghamton.jhelp.ColorStringBuffer

  • public class ColorStringBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class composing a `StringBuffer` with the additional API of basic terminal formatting and coloring via terminal codes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
